ai.summary: Family Walk, Knole is an 11.8 km circular route through Knole Park in the UK. The walk is family-friendly with a moderate pace, offering a mix of parkland, woodland trails, and views of Knole House. Suitable for older children and casual walkers who want a relaxed day out with opportunities to spot deer and wildlife.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly well-maintained paths combining gravel, tarmac, and grassy woodland trails. Expect gentle gradients and flat sections with some uneven or muddy patches after rain. The route is wide in most places, making it easy to share with other walkers and cyclists.
ai.safety_notes: - Wear sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing. - Check the weather forecast and park opening hours. - Deer and other wildlife may be present; give them space and supervise children. - Stay on marked paths; be cautious of wet, muddy sections. - Keep dogs under control and on leads where required. - Watch for cyclists on shared trails; pass with care. - Bring water and a small first-aid kit; inspect ticks after woodland sections.
recommended_gear: Map or offline navigation/fully charged phone
ai.best_seasons: Year-round; peak conditions in spring and autumn when the park is especially scenic and wildlife is active.

seo.title: Family Walk, Knole – 11.8 km Moderate Hike in Knole Park, UK
seo.meta_description: Explore an 11.8 km family-friendly hike around Knole Park in the UK. This moderate route features parkland, woodlands, deer sightings, and a mix of surfaced and natural paths.
seo.h1: Family Walk, Knole – 11.8 km Moderate Hike
